transcript.speaker: SalesRep
transcript.text: hello hi may I speak with Vanessa Roberts

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: This is she

transcript.speaker: SalesRep
transcript.text: good morning Vanessa this is Candace from Christian Telecom the reason for my call today is about the form you filled out on our website for our fiber plans have I caught you at a good time

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: uh for now it's fine but I might be busy soon but we can talk about it now

transcript.speaker: SalesRep
transcript.text: perfect first I'd like to quickly confirm your address and see if it's part of our serviceable locations what we have here is one one three four five key Spruce Way San Antonio Florida 33576 is this correct

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: that's correct

transcript.speaker: SalesRep
transcript.text: perfect so this dress is eligible for a fiber connection we can provide you with a service would you like to know more about our available plans

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: um actually I was just curious if my location's serviceable for fiber but I'm not I'm not really actively looking to switch right now I'm kind of happy with my current provider so

transcript.speaker: SalesRep
transcript.text: I understand uh this is just gonna be a discovery call to see if there are areas where we might be able to help you out with if I could just ask you real quick how much is the average speed you're getting from your current provider

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: um I'm not sure I haven't really checked

transcript.speaker: SalesRep
transcript.text: and what's your current provider

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: bcnc

transcript.speaker: SalesRep
transcript.text: and what do you usually use your connection for browsing gaming streaming

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: um all sorts of things but mainly just browsing Face Time and streaming most of all

transcript.speaker: SalesRep
transcript.text: and are totally happy with how the speed performs for each of these activities or do you think it could be better in some aspects

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: I would say totally happy but mostly it's acceptable when watching videos at 4K there's definitely some lagging it doesn't matter which device on our phones on our TV it was just freeze for a few seconds and then resume I'm guessing it's the connection because it's definitely not the device we just bought this 4K TV last month and it's been happening like clockwork every time you're watching 4K other than that it's fine

transcript.speaker: SalesRep
transcript.text: you know when streaming 4K videos you normally need 25 megabits per second to effectively load without lagging anything lower than 25 it would definitely slow you down one way or another

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: oh really I wasn't exactly aware of that

transcript.speaker: SalesRep
transcript.text: tell you what Vanessa why don't we test your connection and see how much speed you're exactly getting because I think you're getting less than 25 or if you are chances are it's not a consistent 25 throughout the day are you in front of your computer right now

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: no but now that you raised that I'm actually curious since I haven't really checked the speed before huh uh all right let me just go to my computer what do you want me to do

transcript.speaker: SalesRep
transcript.text: so if you could just open a browser and go to speedtest.net

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: uh-huh speedtest.net okay

transcript.speaker: SalesRep
transcript.text: and then click go once you're there

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: okay it says oh wow this thing's moving

transcript.speaker: SalesRep
transcript.text: yep that's the meter the first number should be your download speed

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: okay it says 8.19 and there's another wheel coming up I guess that'll be the upload speed

transcript.speaker: SalesRep
transcript.text: yep that'll be the upload speed

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: huh so now it says 17.43 so 8.19 and 17.43

transcript.speaker: SalesRep
transcript.text: so definitely not enough huh. You know when you're streaming videos we need to look at your download speed how much megabits you're downloading from the web per second okay your download speed is 8.19 that's good enough for 1080p but definitely not for 4K because you see 4K technically is four times the size of 1080p so that's like 2 million pixels versus 8 million pixels per second

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: oh wow so that explains the lagging then

transcript.speaker: SalesRep
transcript.text: oh definitely there's no doubt about it and that's what I'm calling you about today Vanessa if you want to make the most out of your 4K TV that have something much faster for you with an attractive pricing okay you could get up to 800 megabits per second which is roughly 100 times faster than your current download speed would you like to know more about the available plans

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: well that sounds great but how much is it

transcript.speaker: SalesRep
transcript.text: it depends on the plan but 800 megabits per second starts as low as 50 dollars per month plus installation fees

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: um okay I I don't know that's kind of too much for me I I don't think we're willing to pay that much our internet is a little slow but it works for us most of the time so um I don't think so

transcript.speaker: SalesRep
transcript.text: okay how much do you pay monthly for your current connection

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: about 30 33 dollars something like that uh that's kind of like my price range I don't think I want to be paying any higher than that

transcript.speaker: SalesRep
transcript.text: okay okay I get you let me check here okay because I might have something more suitable for you

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: oh okay

transcript.speaker: SalesRep
transcript.text: okay what if I tell you you can get 100 megabits per second for only 25 dollars with free installation fee

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: 25 for how much how much speed

transcript.speaker: SalesRep
transcript.text: 100 megabits not as fast as 800 but definitely 12 times faster than your current download speed more than enough to play 4K and cheaper than 33 dollars how does that sound

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: huh that's getting interesting um but first i'm gonna have to talk to my husband about it um I also have to go to work now can you call me later after work this evening

transcript.speaker: SalesRep
transcript.text: sure I can call you back at six or seven this evening which do you prefer

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: seven should be fine

transcript.speaker: SalesRep
transcript.text: all right then thank you for your time Vanessa I'll call you back at seven in the evening today have a good day

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: you too bye
